text: hi I'm Molly and in this video we will
be talking about two konglish terms
aircon and remote con now when I first
came to Korea I did not know what aircon
or remote con were actually I was in my
classroom and a student told me teacher
turn on the aircon and I looked at him
what's an aircon and then he pointed up
and I realized it was air conditioning
the air conditioner so a similar story
with the remote con I didn't know what a
remote con was and actually I found out
is it remote control so let's look at
the board over here the first sentence
says turn on the air conditioner okay in
English I would never say turn on the
aircon it's always air conditioner the
full word the other sentence we have is
where is the remote control
I wouldn't say where is the remote con
it sounds like you're talking about a
robot or something I don't know what
that means so you need to use the full
word remote control so now you know not
air con air conditioner and not remote
con remote control thanks and have a
good day
